ctl:test.name: sos:GetResultTemplate-Test
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if all the subtest not fail; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: The server does not support the operation "GetResultTemplate", so skip this test.

ctl:test.name: sos:GRTRequestNoService_resultRetrieval
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Send a request (KVP) without parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "MissingParameterValue" and locator "service". Send a request (POST or SOAP) without parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "InvalidRequest" and locator "Expected attribute: service in element InsertResultTemplate@http://www.opengis.net/sos/2.0".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the server (KVP) returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "MissingParameterValue" and locator is "service"; fail otherwise. Pass if the server (POST or SOAP) returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "InvalidRequest" and locator is "Expected attribute: service in element InsertResultTemplate@http://www.opengis.net/sos/2.0"; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the GetResultTemplate response schema for "SOS" />.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Checking the validity of the response to a GetResultTemplate request with no service parameter.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a GetResultTemplate request with no service parameter specified.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "MissingParameterValue" and a locator of "service".

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a GetResultTemplate request with no service parameter specified.

The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "InvalidRequest" and a locator of "Expected attribute: service in element GetResultTemplate@http://www.opengis.net/sos/2.0".

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Send a request with null parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "MissingParameterValue" and locator "service".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the server returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "MissingParameterValue" and locator is "service"; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the GetResultTemplate response schema for "SOS" />.

FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a GetResultTemplate request with null service parameter specified.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "MissingParameterValue" and a locator of "service".

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the GetResultTemplate response schema for "SOS" />.

ctl:test.name: sos:GRTRequestValidRequest_resultRetrieval
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Send a valid request ,and there must be have a valid GetResultTemplateResponse returned.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the observation listed in GetResultTemplateResponse are same to GetResultTemplate request; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the GetResultTemplate response schema for "SOS" />.
